name: Container Network Interface plugins
description: CNI (Container Network Interface), a Cloud Native Computing Foundation project, consists of a specification and libraries for writing plugins to configure network interfaces in Linux containers, along with a number of supported plugins.

pkg_cni_plugins_version.description: Specifies the CNI plugins version to be installed

pkg_cni_plugins_folder.description: Defines the destination folder for the CNI plugin binaries

pkg_flannel_version.description: Specifies the Flannel CNI version to be installed

pkg_cni_plugins_install_flannel.description: Installs Flannel CNI into the CNI folder
